# iosxr_xml_agent (Resource)

This resource can manage the XML Agent configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_xml_agent" "example" {
  enable                    = true
  tty_enable                = true
  tty_streaming_size        = 1000
  tty_iteration_size        = "off"
  tty_throttle_process_rate = 5000
  tty_throttle_memory       = 300
  tty_session_timeout       = 30
  ssl_enable                = true
  ssl_streaming_size        = 1000
  ssl_iteration_size        = "off"
  ssl_throttle_process_rate = 5000
  ssl_throttle_memory       = 300
  ssl_session_timeout       = 30
  ssl_vrfs = [
    {
      vrf_name         = "default"
      shutdown         = true
      ipv4_access_list = "ACL_IPV4"
    }
  ]
  ipv6_enable           = true
  ipv4_disable          = true
  streaming_size        = 1000
  iteration_size        = "off"
  throttle_process_rate = 5000
  throttle_memory       = 300
  session_timeout       = 30
  vrfs = [
    {
      vrf_name         = "VRF1"
      shutdown         = false
      ipv6_access_list = "ACL1"
      ipv4_access_list = "ACL2"
    }
  ]
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `enable` (Boolean) Enable default agent for XML requests
- `ipv4_disable` (Boolean) Disable IPv4 Transport
- `ipv6_enable` (Boolean) Enable IPv6 Transport
- `iteration_size` (String) Iterator size in Kbytes (1-100000) or 'off' to disable
- `session_timeout` (Number) Session timeout in seconds (1-1440)
  - Range: `1`-`1440`
- `ssl_enable` (Boolean) Enable ssl agent for XML requests
- `ssl_iteration_size` (String) Iterator size in Kbytes (1-100000) or 'off' to disable
- `ssl_session_timeout` (Number) Session timeout in seconds (1-1440)
  - Range: `1`-`1440`
- `ssl_streaming_size` (Number) Streaming size in Kbytes (1-100000)
  - Range: `1`-`100000`
- `ssl_throttle_memory` (Number) Memory usage in Mbytes (100-1024)
  - Range: `100`-`1024`
- `ssl_throttle_process_rate` (Number) Process rate in tags per second (1000-30000)
  - Range: `1000`-`30000`
- `ssl_vrfs` (Attributes List) VRF name (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ssl_vrfs))
- `streaming_size` (Number) Streaming size in Kbytes (1-100000)
  - Range: `1`-`100000`
- `throttle_memory` (Number) Memory usage in Mbytes (100-1024)
  - Range: `100`-`1024`
- `throttle_process_rate` (Number) Process rate in tags per second (1000-30000)
  - Range: `1000`-`30000`
- `tty_enable` (Boolean) Enable tty agent for XML requests
- `tty_iteration_size` (String) Iterator size in Kbytes (1-100000) or 'off' to disable
- `tty_session_timeout` (Number) Session timeout in seconds (1-1440)
  - Range: `1`-`1440`
- `tty_streaming_size` (Number) Streaming size in Kbytes (1-100000)
  - Range: `1`-`100000`
- `tty_throttle_memory` (Number) Memory usage in Mbytes (100-1024)
  - Range: `100`-`1024`
- `tty_throttle_process_rate` (Number) Process rate in tags per second (1000-30000)
  - Range: `1000`-`30000`
- `vrfs` (Attributes List) VRF name (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--vrfs))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

### Nested Schema for `ssl_vrfs`

Required:

- `vrf_name` (String) VRF name

Optional:

- `ipv4_access_list` (String) IPv4 access list name
- `shutdown` (Boolean) Shutdown VRF default configuration

### Nested Schema for `vrfs`

Required:

- `vrf_name` (String) VRF name

Optional:

- `ipv4_access_list` (String) IPv4 access list name
- `ipv6_access_list` (String) IPv6 access list name
- `shutdown` (Boolean) Shutdown VRF default configuration

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_xml_agent.example ""
```
